tidbits.title: Tropical Paradise
tidbits.description: French Polynesia is a tropical paradise, comprising over 100 islands with stunning turquoise lagoons, white sandy beaches, and diverse marine life.

tidbits.title: Cultural Richness
tidbits.description: The islands have a rich Polynesian culture, evident in traditional dance, music, intricate tattoos, and the preservation of ancient customs and rituals.

tidbits.title: Overwater Bungalows
tidbits.description: French Polynesia is famous for its luxurious overwater bungalows, offering a unique and indulgent accommodation experience amidst picturesque surroundings.
